Sentencas: Hybrid power plants which combine a micro gas turbine with solid oxide fuel cells, are projected to reach very high electric efficiencies.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: Powered by biogas, they have the potential to become an important pillar for a future CO2-neutral energy mix.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: However, to compensate the fluctuating energy yield of wind turbines and photovoltaic power plants, they should also provide a wide operating range.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: While previous numerical studies show that this is the case for natural gas powered hybrid power plants, the impact of biogas utilization on the operating range is still unknown.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: In the present study, a detailed numeric model of the hybrid power plant demonstrator being constructed at the DLR is presented.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The model is used for an in-depth investigation of the operating limits using biogases with various methane contents.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: The influence of fuel cell operating limits, like the stack temperature, minimal cell voltage and maximal fuel utilization ratio, on the hybrid power plant operating range are discussed.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: While the results show a strong correlation between methane content and operating range, a power output reduction of 33% is still feasible for methane contents as low as 60 vol%.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: Furthermore, knowing the operating range of the hybrid power plant is crucial for the design of the plant components.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant

Sentencas: Therefore, in a final step, the operating conditions for the fuel cell off-gas combustor are derived for the respective operating ranges.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of operating range and SOFC-off-gas combustor requirements of a biogas powered SOFC-MGT hybrid power plant
